snippet.title: Quake - Something Wicked This Way Comes (Nightmare Difficulty)
snippet.description:
"Three-map singleplayer campaign of epic proportions: A huge arcane demon fortress built into a mountain, complete with a canyon start map and a bloody boss arena.  Featuring a plethora of new monsters and items, many secrets and hard gameplay."

The 3rd Map 1 secret (Light / Green armor) can be found behind the player at 1:10 
A grenade launcher upgrade can be found on the ramp (left-side) at 15:28

I opted not to go for them since in Map 1 you get yellow armor shortly afterwards which is a better armor rating.  In Map 2 the grenade launcher upgrade allows you to fire an explosive in a curved fashion and travels much further than the standard grenade launcher.  While fairly helpful it's quickly invalidated by picking up the rocket launcher at the secret just moments after, it has a much faster projectile speed and is more reliable at hitting targets.

Source port (vkQuake): https://github.com/Novum/vkQuake
Map download: https://www.quaddicted.com/reviews/something_wicked.html

Music list
-----------------------------------------
Map 1: Heretic 2 - Track 6
Map 2: Myth | The Fallen Lords - Smiths of Muirthemne
Map 3: Myth | The Fallen Lords - Heart of the Stone
